mapper.insert: INSERT INTO score(class_id, user_id, course_id, date, score) VALUES(#{classId}, #{userId}, #{courseId}, #{date}, #{score})
mapper.select: SELECT quiz_id, class_id, user_id, course_id, date, score FROM score WHERE class_id = #{classId}
SELECT quiz_id, class_id, user_id, course_id, date, score FROM score WHERE user_id = #{userId}

SELECT s.score_id, s.status, s.score, s.date, u.name, c.class_name FROM score s,user u, class c WHERE s.user_id = u.user_id AND s.class_id = c.class_id AND u.user_id = #{userId};
